name: ENIAC LOGIC
description:
Eniac simple but addictive puzzle game. You have to remove , rotate the blocks so that they do not interfere in the way of a particle. In the game you are waiting large levels , excellent graphics. There are many interesting things, such as: communicators , switches , lasers, scanning beams , timers and more. It's all distinguishes this game from others in the style of "parking". If you like sliding puzzles in the style of "Unblock" , in no case did not miss Eniac! Such a game you have ever seen!

Web site XTRUN GROUP
